1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik would place his hands over his ears and say:"May my ears be made deaf, if I did not hear the messenger of Allah saying: 'Perform ablution after (eating) that which has been changed by fire

chapter.eng-name: Ablution after (eating) that which has been changed by fire (i.e., cooked upon fire)
